original_title: Low Pine, Eldertown: The Mysterious Adventures of the Badger Kid
overview: In the sleepy little town of Low Pine, the Badger Kid pursues a man he recognizes from a photo. Unbeknownst to what it is, the Badger Kid is looking for something and this man may hold the answers.
tagline: A MAN IN SEARCH OF ANSWERS
title: Low Pine, Eldertown: The Mysterious Adventures of the Badger Kid
